title: Soap spoilers: Emmerdale death, Coronation Street and EastEnders violence
text:
All good things must come to an end and Emmerdale seals the fate of Robron as Robert Sugden (Ryan Hawley) and Aaron Dingle (Danny Miller) prepare to flee the village together – but how will their story end? Over in EastEnders, a love story is just beginning as Tiffany Butcher (Maisie Smith) and Keegan Baker (Zack Morris) make big plans for the future.

Elsewhere, Coronation Street has a blast for the past for David Platt (Jack P Shepherd) in the form of rapist Josh Tucker (Ryan Clayaton – but that isn’t his only problem. Elsewhere, Joel Dexter (Rory Speed) discovers Mercedes McQueen’s (Jennifer Metcalfe) shocking secret – but will he expose the truth?

In other developments, there’s the injury of a child, a pregnancy disaster, a surprise Christmas, a love confession, a business proposal, a shocking decision, a violent injury, an unexpected discovery, an ultimatum and an outburst.

EastEnders

1. Tiffany opens up to Keegan and tells him that she is ready to take the next step in their relationship. As they then have a conversation about their future, they reach a decision and shock their family with a major announcement. But how will it go down?

2. Stuart is still furious with Kathy for what she did to Rainie and blackmails her into letting Rainie spend time with Abi. But as Rainie takes Abi to the park, Stuart is devastated by what he finds. With Rainie in ruins, Stuart turns on Kathy and threatens to hurt Ben and Ian.

3. Ben instructs Martin to do another job for him but Martin insists that he doesn’t need him to come along with him. Later, things get out of hand and Martin ends up seriously injured – and a frantic Sonia demands answers about what is going on.

4. Mick heads out for his doctor’s appointment about his anxiety attacks and leaves Mitch in charge of the Queen Vic bar. Linda arrives back and is confused to find Mitch there – but wonders what is going on when she learns where Mick is.

5. Leo continues to woo Whitney but she has second thoughts when she sees Callum. Later, Whitney is confused when Tiffany recognises Leo and Leo fears that his best laid plans will be ruined. Afterwards, Whitney gets drunk and makes an admission.

6. Iqra is frustrated and tells Ruby that she doesn’t know why Ash is refusing to introduce her to her family.

7. Gray sees that Karen is down in the dumps and suggests they have a party to celebrate Chantelle’s pregnancy.

Coronation Street

8. Shona is at the end of her tether with Max and when Harry is injured and taken to hospital, she instinctively blames Max, only to later discover it was Lily. As Max visits Callum’s mum Marion, she rocks up and tells Shona that she plans to fight her for custody of Max.

9. Gemma manages to net VIP tickets to a football match but is mortified when the fire brigade have to dismantle a turn stile to free her when she becomes trapped. However, it gets her some media attention and soon a PR is trying to get her press coverage.

10. Sinead heads out for a family picnic but finds herself too ill to stay and she ends up having to go home. With Sinead admitting to Beth that she can’t even carry out simple tasks, Kirk realises she won’t make it to Christmas and gets everyone to help plan an early festive day for her.

11. David is in a foul mood after discovering that Marion is going to go for custody of Max and as he heads to the hospital wing to get his medication, he is stunned to see Josh being treated and learns that he in prison for drugging and raping someone.

12. Geoff suggests to Yasmeen that they invest in Speed Daal as they are the ones who seem to be doing all of the work but Alya is only interested in having Yasmeen on board. However, Geoff then contacts Zeedan, who agrees to sell his share to him.

Advertisement

13. James and Brian encourage Bethany with her creative writing but when James reads her work, he realises that she is writing about herself and it makes it very clear that she is in love with Daniel. Bethany swears him to secret.

14. Addict Ali seeks private advice from Toyah about his situation.

Emmerdale

15. Robert’s world is shattered when he hears that Lee has died from his injuries and he knows that he now faces a much longer sentence for the crime – with little chance of leniency. Meanwhile, Aaron and Liv also reel from the shocking turn of events.

16. Faith tries to restore things between a struggling Cain and Moira but when she sees Pete and Moira having a hushed conversation, she is suspicious and confronts Pete. Pete heads to Moira and warns her that Faith is onto her.

17. Unable to face years in prison, Robert decides to go on the run from the law and Aaron decides to go with him. After a conversation with Liv, Aaron makes his mind up and the couple say emotional goodbyes to their loved ones.

18. Robert and Aaron put their plan into action – but will they make it or will the law catch up with them? And are they both sure about what they are doing?

19. Preparations continue for the re-opening of the Woolpack.

Hollyoaks

20. As Mitchell continues to struggle with his feelings, he is worried when Anita takes to the stage and means business. With Cleo oblivious and happier than ever, Scott confronts Mitchell who tells him that he loves Cleo but wants Anita – and he doesn’t know what to do for the best.

Advertisement

21. After Tony finds Harry’s phone, it ends up in Joel’s hands and he hears the confession between Mercedes and Liam. He heads to Mercedes and tells her he wants her to spend some time with her family – before he then reports her to the police.

(Picture: Lime Pictures)

22. Following James lashing out and hitting him, Romeo is squatting in the Maalik house and Peri finds him and is worried by his state of mind. After lashing out at Marnie, it’s clear that James is in a dark place – and may have lost Romeo for good.

23. Walter returns home following his stroke and Martine tries to ensure that he is comfortable but soon the reason for his ill health becomes clear and it drives Martine to consider drastic action.

24. Liberty tries to do some matchmaking between Sienna and Brody ahead of her first scan but it doesn’t go well. Sienna is still determined to win Brody back but she is unnerved when she sees him getting close with Cindy.

25. Mandy begins to wonder if Ollie is starting to doubt the adoption plans but he insists he wants to go ahead with it. However, it’s soon clear that he is torn as he doesn’t want to lose either Brooke or the baby.
